backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping each product feature (visual theme, layout, file picker, player controls, etc.) to their implementing source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the project's frontend architecture.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes used by shadcn/ui components.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the React app titled 'UltraSound Pro' that mounts the app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component that wires together all hooks (audio engine, files, player, battery) and renders the four-region layout (Header, left panel, center panel, bottom panel) with error boundaries.
frontend/src/components/AudioEngineFallb: Fallback UI component displayed when the Web Audio API is unavailable, showing a styled warning with browser recommendations.
frontend/src/components/BatteryWidget.ts: Animated battery charging widget that visualizes charge percentage with a rising fill, lightning bolt animations, wattage counters, and a glow effect when fully charged.
frontend/src/components/Equalizer.tsx: 20-band equalizer component rendering vertical sliders for each frequency band with debounced audio engine updates, gain value labels, and highlighted band indicators linked to instrument controls.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: A React class component that catches rendering errors within a named section and displays an error message with a retry button to reset the error state.
frontend/src/components/FilePicker.tsx: A file picker component supporting drag-and-drop and browse-button file selection for audio formats, with visual drag feedback and error display.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: The app header displaying the UltraSound Pro logo, title, and a sound engine selector component.
frontend/src/components/InstrumentContro: Renders a grid of 20 instrument sliders that map to EQ band gains, with debounced updates to the audio engine and visual highlighting for active instruments.
frontend/src/components/PlayerControls.t: Displays playback controls (play, pause, stop, skip), a seek bar, and current track info including name, artist, and playback status.
frontend/src/components/Playlist.tsx: Renders a scrollable playlist of audio files with track selection, format badges, duration display, and per-track remove functionality.
frontend/src/components/SoundEngineSelec: A button group component for selecting among four named sound engines, highlighting the currently active one.
frontend/src/components/SpectrumVisualiz: A React canvas component that renders a real-time frequency spectrum analyzer using Web Audio API data, drawing gold-to-blue gradient bars with glow effects and falling back to a flat idle line when no analyser is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates all dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioEngine.ts: A React hook that manages a Web Audio API pipeline consisting of a 20-band BiquadFilter EQ chain, a gain node, and an analyser node, exposing controls to initialize the context, connect/disconnect audio sources, and adjust filter gains.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioFiles.ts: A React hook that manages a list of local audio files, handling format validation, metadata parsing (name/artist from filename), duration extraction, and object URL lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioPlayer.ts: A React hook that controls an HTMLAudioElement for playlist playback, providing play/pause/stop/seek/next/previous actions and tracking playback state, current time, and the active track.
frontend/src/hooks/useBatteryCharging.ts: A React hook that simulates a battery charging animation over 12 seconds using requestAnimationFrame, exposing percentage, wattage, and an isUnlocked flag that becomes true when fully charged.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanvasAnimation.ts: A minimal React hook that wraps a requestAnimationFrame loop, exposing start and stop controls for running a provided draw function continuously.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: A React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY's AuthClient, managing login status, identity persistence, and delegation validity checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module for backend queries; exports nothing since the app is client-side only.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Tailwind and Google Fonts, defining CSS custom properties for the dark blue/gold theme, glassmorphism utilities, glow effects, and custom range slider styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/utils/audioConstants.ts: Defines the 20 EQ frequency bands, gain range constants, frequency labels, and preset gain curves for the four named sound engines.
frontend/src/utils/debounce.ts: Generic debounce utility that delays invoking a function until after a specified delay has elapsed since the last call.
frontend/src/utils/instrumentMappings.ts: Defines 20 instrument objects, each mapping a name, emoji, color, and the specific EQ frequency band indices that instrument occupies.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom fonts (Orbitron, Rajdhani, Inter), gold/blue glow shadows, OKLCH-based color tokens, and accordion animations, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing the ultra-premium music player app's architecture, existing features, known issues, and image requirements at schema version 3.
